title: The Locker
brief_description: An experimental film about a young man and his involvement with a mysterious locker. During an interview voices emerge from the locker, later its resence torments him. The situation is treated in a surrealistic manner. Cast: James Dunkley, Paul Smythe, Nancy Gabrielle
